word: H6292 - פִּגּוּל - piggûwl - pig-gool' - Abominable - அருவருப்பான

sections.paragraph: a foul thing, refuse; unclean sacrificial flesh (the only use)
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to stink; properly fetid, that is, (figuratively) unclean (ceremonially): - abominable (-tion, thing).
